title: Strawberry and coconut trifle
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out
200ml/7fl oz double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
400g/14oz strawberries, hulled and chopped into large chunks
55ml/2fl oz orange liqueur, plus extra for drizzling
250g/9oz ready-made sponge cake (madeira cake, swiss roll or muffins)
